snippet.title: Horizon Call of the Mountain - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Horizon Call of the Mountain, created for PlayStation’s Next-Gen VR hardware, is an upcoming brand-new adventure in the world of Horizon.
Embrace a new level of immersion in an unique experience, designed to push hardware technology, innovation, and gameplay.

Developed by Guerrilla and Firesprite.
